jailbreakpipe.pipelines package

Submodules

jailbreakpipe.pipelines.inference module

class jailbreakpipe.pipelines.inference.InferPipeline(config: InferPipelineConfig, verbose: bool = False)[source]

Bases: object

Inference pipeline for managing and executing attacks and defenses.

管理和执行攻击和防御的推理流程。

Parameters:

  • config – Configuration for the inference pipeline, including attacker, defender, and judges. 推理流程的配置，包括攻击者、防御者和评审者。

  • verbose – Whether to enable verbose logging for debugging and transparency. 是否启用详细日志记录，用于调试和透明化。

calc_tokens() → Dict[str, Dict[str, int]][source]

Calculate the token usage for both the attacker and defender, summarizing prompt and completion tokens.

计算攻击者和防御者的Token使用量，包括提示和完成Token。

Returns:

Dictionary containing detailed token usage for both roles. 包含双方详细Token使用量的字典。

log(messages: List[Dict[str, str]], stage: str | None = None)[source]

Log messages for each stage of the pipeline if verbose logging is enabled.

如果启用了详细日志记录，则记录流程每个阶段的消息。

Parameters:

  • messages – The messages to be logged at the current stage. 当前阶段要记录的消息。

  • stage – A label for the current stage of the pipeline. 流程当前阶段的标签。

parallel_judging(defense: List[Dict[str, str]], request: str) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Perform parallel evaluation of the defense using multiple judges.

使用多个评审者并行评估防御。

Parameters:

  • defense – Messages that have been defended and need evaluation. 已经防御并需要评估的消息。

  • request – The original request for context in evaluation. 评估中使用的原始请求。

Returns:

A dictionary containing the results from each judge. 包含每个评审者结果的字典。

reset()[source]

Reset the state of all LLMs in the pipeline, preparing them for a new inference run.

重置流程中所有LLM的状态，准备进行新的推理。

class jailbreakpipe.pipelines.inference.InferPipelineConfig(attacker_config: ~jailbreakpipe.role.attacks.base.BaseAttackerConfig | None = None, defender_config: ~jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.base.BaseDefenderConfig | None = None, judge_configs: ~typing.List[~jailbreakpipe.role.judges.base.BaseJudgeConfig] = <factory>)[source]

Bases: object

Configuration class for the inference pipeline.

配置类，用于推理流程。

Parameters:

  • attacker_config – Configuration for the attacker, detailing its parameters and behavior. 攻击者的配置，详细描述其参数和行为。

  • defender_config – Configuration for the defender, detailing its parameters and behavior. 防御者的配置，详细描述其参数和行为。

  • judge_configs – List of configurations for any judges used in evaluating the effectiveness of the defense. 评估防御有效性的评审者配置列表。

attacker_config: BaseAttackerConfig = None
defender_config: BaseDefenderConfig = None
judge_configs: List[BaseJudgeConfig]
jailbreakpipe.pipelines.inference.llm_register(attr: BaseAttacker | BaseDefender | BaseJudge) → List[BaseLLM][source]

Register any LLM instances associated with the given attribute (attacker, defender, or judge).

为给定属性（攻击者、防御者或评审者）注册任何LLM实例。

Parameters:

attr – An instance of an attacker, defender, or judge. 攻击者、防御者或评审者的实例。

Returns:

List of registered LLM instances. 注册的LLM实例列表。
